data.footerTitle: Create a board for any project, give it a name, and invite your team.

data.footerTitle: Add lists to create steps in a workflow that is right for you.

data.footerTitle: Create cards for tasks to complete or information you want to organize.

data.footerTitle: Click on a card to add details, due dates, checklists, comments, and more.

data.footerTitle: Move them across lists to show progress. Go from 'To Do' to 'Done' in no time!
